patterns: Do you have a mobile app?
Why is there no mobile app?
responses: Currently we only have this website. But in future we will have an IOS and Android application.

patterns: Why should I use this app/website?
responses: Using our website, you'll gain valuable insights into your spending habits, enabling smarter money decisions.
We're committed to helping you achieve financial wellness by offering tools, tips, and resources tailored to your needs.

patterns: How do I track my expenses?
responses: You can log expenses by adding them manually.
For manual entries, simply go to the 'Add Expense' section and fill in the details.
For manual entries, simply go to the 'Add Income' section and fill in the details.
For manual entries, simply go to the 'Add Loans' section and fill in the details.

patterns: How should I categorize my expenses?
What categories should I use for my budget?
I'm not sure how to organize my expenses
responses: Group expenses into categories like housing, food, and transport.
Categorize based on your lifestyle for better financial visuals.
Use common categories: housing, utilities, groceries, entertainment.
Organize expenses in a way that helps with your financial goals.

patterns: I'm having an issue logging in
Problem with viewing my expense report
responses: Clear browser cache and cookies, then try logging in again.
Check if you're using the latest browser version for compatibility.
If issues cannot be resolved, our support team is ready to assist you.
Trouble with the site? Refreshing the page often helps.

patterns: How do you protect my information?
What security measures are in place?
responses: We prioritize your data's security with top-notch encryption.
Your data is protected using advanced security protocols.
Regular security updates keep your information safe and private.
Our platform monitors to strict data protection standards.

patterns: I got an error message, what do I do?

responses: Note the error and contact support for quick resolution.
Refreshing the page can resolve many common issues.
Log out, then log back in to fix some errors.
For unfixable errors our support team is here to help.

patterns: How do I change my password?

patterns: How do I upgrade my plan?
responses: Check out our range of plans under Subscription plans.
Upgrade your plan anytime in Account Settings > Subscription.
Subscribers enjoy exclusive benefits see pricing for details.
Cancellation is easy just visit your Subscription under settings and click cancel.
